title: Adam L. Ozer
text: I am Adam, Senior Data Scientist/Associated Director at Verian (formerly Kantar Public) on the Population Studies Team. I am a quantitative researcher and social scientist in both industry and academia. My work has been featured in peer-reviewed journals such as Public Opinion Quarterly, Business & Politics, and Electoral Studies and continue to contribute research at the University of Houston, London School of Economics, and the Open University.
